analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/19/0xbd2db105b965d74e91deed64ec4b441beab9d498.sol#637-641) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/19/0xbd2db105b965d74e91deed64ec4b441beab9d498.sol#654-660)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/19/0xbd2db105b965d74e91deed64ec4b441beab9d498.sol#666-671)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/19/0xbd2db105b965d74e91deed64ec4b441beab9d498.sol#680-683)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/19/0xbd2db105b965d74e91deed64ec4b441beab9d498.sol#686-690)

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0xbd2db105b965d74e91deed64ec4b441beab9d498.sol#803-810) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/19/0xbd2db105b965d74e91deed64ec4b441beab9d498.sol#806-808)
